Description: On I-95 at mile marker 163 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north left center lane, right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 1.0 mile.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On VA-150 South in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of the ramp at Belmont Road; Chippenham Parkway, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
